<h2 class="heading A-TYP22L-RW-ALL remove-bottom-space" id="pp_tools_heading_1">

</h2>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_tools_richtext_1" class="remove-bottom-space A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">

<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The more you exchange, the more rewards you get. Seize the opportunity now and celebrate with us!</p>
</div></div>

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Challenge #1: Accumulate currency exchange transactions for up to HKD1,600 in cash rewards
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            





        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_tools_richtext_2" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">New currency exchange customers<sup>*</sup> can enjoy HKD160 in cash rewards for every accumulated eligible currency exchange transaction of HKD200,000 (or its equivalent).</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The more you exchange, the more rewards you get. Each eligible customer can enjoy <strong>up to HKD1,600</strong> in cash rewards during the offer period!</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Exchange now through our designated channels:</p>
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL">
 <li>HSBC HK App / Online Banking</li>
 <li>HSBC Mastercard® Debit Card~</li>
 <li>Branch / Phone Banking</li>
</ul>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">*Offer is applicable to new currency exchange customers only, who have made no currency exchange transaction with HSBC during 1 January 2024 to 31 December 2024.</p>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">~Currency exchange transactions conducted directly via HSBC Mastercard® Debit Card (locally or overseas).</p>
</div></div>

            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="pp_tools_title_2" class="remove-bottom-space ">
    
    <div class="anchor" id="offer-3-enjoy-a-deposit-interest-rate-of-up-to-11percentage-pa"></div>

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Challenge #2: Join HSBC Forex Club & accumulate debit card transactions for up to HKD80 in cash rewards
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="pp_tools_richtext_3" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Upon completing Challenge #1^, join HSBC Forex Club ; and enjoy HKD10 in cash rewards for each accumulation of eligible debit card transactions of HKD5,000 (or its equivalent).</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The more you spend, the more rewards you get. Each eligible customer can enjoy <strong>up to HK$80</strong> in cash rewards during the offer period!</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Join our currency exchange loyalty program, HSBC Forex Club, via the HSBC HK App with simple steps at no extra charges.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Enroll now to enjoy unlimited instant discounts on currency exchange spreads of up to 30% off. Find out more <a href="/investments/products/foreign-exchange/forex-club/" target="_self">here</a>.</p>
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p>
<p class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL">^Challenge #2 is only applicable to customers who have fulfilled the requirement of Challenge #1, i.e. customers must have minimum currency exchange transactions of HKD200,000 (or its equivalent) within the offer period.</p>
</div></div>
